title: Fourth Wing Basics
description: Test your knowledge of Rebecca Yarros's bestseller!

questions.question: What is the name of the war college where the story takes place?
questions.explanation: Basgiath War College is the elite military academy where riders are trained and bonded with dragons.

questions.question: What is the main character's name?
questions.explanation: Violet Sorrengail is the protagonist who was meant to enter the Scribe Quadrant but was forced into the Riders Quadrant.

questions.question: Violet originally wanted to become a dragon rider.
questions.explanation: Violet was training to be a scribe and only entered the Riders Quadrant because her mother forced her.

questions.question: What physical condition does Violet have?

options.text: A joint condition that makes her fragile

questions.explanation: Violet has a condition similar to Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, making her joints hypermobile and prone to injury.

questions.question: What is the kingdom called where the story is set?
questions.explanation: The story is set in the kingdom of Navarre, which has been at war with neighboring Poromiel.

questions.question: Fourth Wing is the first book in the Empyrean series.
questions.explanation: Fourth Wing is the first book in the Empyrean series by Rebecca Yarros, followed by Iron Flame.

questions.question: What dangerous event happens on the first day at Basgiath?
questions.explanation: Cadets must cross the narrow, dangerous parapet to enter Basgiath, and many fall to their deaths.

questions.question: What is Violet's mother's position?
questions.explanation: Lilith Sorrengail is a decorated general and the commanding officer of the Eastern Wing.
